label: deviceID
comment: Device ID of the physical sensor/ measurement station corresponding to this observation.

label: deviceName
comment: Device Name or Station name of the sensor device/station corresponding to this observation.

label: deviceType
comment: The type of device or sensor corresponding to this observation.

label: deviceStatus
comment: Indicates the operational status of physical device or sensor. For eg., active, inactive, etc

label: deviceModel
comment: Describes the information of the device, sensor or system in consideration.

label: rfID
comment: Gives the ID of the RFID reader.

label: deviceBatteryStatus
comment: Gives the Battery charging status of the reporting device(Connected, Disconnected).

label: deviceSimNumber
comment: Gives the sim number of a particular device.

label: rssi
comment: The RSSI (Received Signal Strength Indicator) value of the entity corresponding to this observation.

label: deviceIdentityNumber
comment: The unique 15 digit International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI) number of the device corresponding to this observation.

label: devicePrecision
comment: The precision of the device or sensor corresponding to this observation.

label: deviceSensitivity
comment: The sensitivity of the device or sensor corresponding to this observation.

label: deviceResolution
comment: The resolution of the device or sensor corresponding to this observation.

label: location
comment: The physical location of the entity corresponding to the observation.

label: purposeDescription
comment: Descibes the purpose of the entity or service corresponding this observation.
